activities: AccessData is contracted by organizations to retrieve data from their IT systems or provide technical support to those systems, which can include personal information on servers, desktops, laptops, mobile devices, etc. The information is gathered and stored internally at AccessData or within the client's environment and is accessed only by authorized personnel contracted by the organization requesting the services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities panel (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) are available for investigation into unresolved complaints for all categories of data covered
